contentList.content:
Breathe a chilling blast, dealing [1], covering the area in ice and Chilling enemies. Applies a stack of Agony.

A target may be afflicted with up to five stacks of Agony, each dealing piercing damage on apply and on each turn.

Shriek in a cone, dealing [1] and applying Deaf to enemies without Physical Armour for 1 turn. Applies a stack of Agony.

A target may be afflicted with up to five stacks of Agony, each dealing piercing damage on apply and on each turn.
Hmm.. Such a fascinating soul... Perhaps you could be of use to me...
Pleasure doing business with you. I'm sure I'll be seeing more of you soon...
Yes. I wish to become a Spectre by applying the preset to myself.
Hmm.. Such a fascinating soul... Perhaps you could be of use to me...
No. I have already decided on my path.

Is this a willing soul I see? Agony and Dread await you - are you sure?

WARNING: This process will replace your inventory. Ensure you empty your inventory in a suitable container / party member before switching!
Pleasure doing business with you. I'm sure I'll be seeing more of you soon...
I want to change my class.
I'm thinking about becoming a Spectre.
A pity, but it's your decision. I needn't worry - I have other methods to take your soul...
Foolish mortal. I can only wish you good luck...
Anyone may take the pact, so long as they have a soul. Are you interested in using soul magic?
I'm fine with my current class.
A pity, but it's your decision. I needn't worry - I have other methods to take your soul...

Open a gateway to the River Styx lasting 3 turns. The portal has a 4m radius and affects both allies and enemies.

Allies become Exalted, granting [1]% Damage and additional Movement.

Enemies become Lamented, causing [2]% Damage and [3]% Movement Speed.

Shift into a ghostly shade and re-emerge at target location, dealing [1] and applying a stack of Agony to all enemies hit.

A target may be afflicted with up to five stacks of Agony, each dealing piercing damage on apply and on each turn.
Deals [1] damage on apply and at the start of each turn.
Deals [1] damage on apply and at the start of each turn.
Deals [1] damage on apply and at the start of each turn.
Deals [1] damage on apply and at the start of each turn.
Deals [1] damage on apply and at the start of each turn.

A target may be afflicted by a maximum of one curse at a time.
Enemies within 6m are also cursed.
A target may be afflicted by a maximum of one curse at a time.

A target may be afflicted by a maximum of one curse at a time.
Enemies within 6m are also cursed.
A target may be afflicted by a maximum of one curse at a time.

A target may be afflicted by a maximum of one curse at a time.
Enemies within 6m are also cursed.
A target may be afflicted by a maximum of one curse at a time.
Mild afflication to bestow torment; a worthy sacrifice.

You may have a maximum of one pact at a time.
Range: +4m
You may have a maximum of one pact at a time.

You may have a maximum of one pact at a time.
Vitality cannot fall below 1HP
The end is nigh; this is just the beginning...
Upon removal or expiry, the character will explode, dealing massive <font color="#c80030">piercing damage</font> and applying <font color="#67ffdd">Agony</font> to nearby targets.
Fear has gripped this character. It cannot be controlled and will automatically try to run away.
It's so easy to exploit stupidity...

Manifest the soul of your Scythe into a projectile, dealing [1] applying a stack of Agony to enemies.

A target may be afflicted with up to five stacks of Agony, each dealing piercing damage on apply and on each turn:

1 stack: [2]
2 stacks: [3]
3 stacks: [4]
4 stacks: [5]
5 stacks: [6]

Range: [2]
Launches a magical missile that inherits the power and damage type of the staff. The better the staff, the more damage this spell sows. Can target terrain.

Direct a wicked soul, forking between enemies up to [2] times in a [3] radius, dealing [1] damage and applying a stack of Agony to each.

A target may be afflicted with up to five stacks of Agony, each dealing piercing damage on apply and on each turn.

Cast a volatile jolt of energy, dealing [1] and applying a stack of Agony.

A target may be afflicted with up to five stacks of Agony, each dealing piercing damage on apply and on each turn.

Manifest your lifeforce into a volatile projectile, bouncing between characters.

Allies are forced to become Mordant for 2 turns, gaining Intelligence and [3] AP Recovery at the cost of [2] Elemental Resistance.

Enemies are afflicted with a stack of Agony and Perish for 2 turns, causing reduced Constitution, Wits, and [4]% Physical Resistance.

Command a powerful bolt of energy which travels through enemies and deals [1]. Applies a stack of Agony.

A target may be afflicted with up to five stacks of Agony, each dealing piercing damage on apply and on each turn.

Manifest [2] souls into wicked projectiles and launch them at the nearest [2] enemies. Each soul deals [1] and applies a stack of Agony to their mark.

A target may be afflicted with up to five stacks of Agony, each dealing piercing damage on apply and on each turn.
|Ice pellets fall from the sky, chilling enemies and dealing [1] damage. Creates Ice surface when targeted at the ground.|

Muster a dreadful downpour in the target area lasting 2 turns.

Enemies within are afflicted with Dread, causing [1]% Piercing and Physical Resistances for 2 turns.

Radius: [1]
Duration: [2]
Creates water puddles on terrain, douses fires, and makes characters wet. Wet makes target less resistant to air spells but more resistant to fire spells.

Become truly spectral, gaining Invisibility for 1 turn and Ghostwalk for 2 turns.

Ghostwalk allows you to ignore surfaces whilst moving.

Take the Pact of Artillery, sacrificing Movement to gain 4m Range.

You may only take one Pact at a time; taking a new one terminates previous contracts.

Take the Pact of Brutality, sacrificing [1] Constitution to gain [2]% Damage.

You may only take one Pact at a time; taking a new one terminates previous contracts.

Take the Pact of Immortality, sacrificing [1]% Damage to gain Immortality, preventing you from dying.

You may only take one Pact at a time; taking a new one terminates previous contracts.

Morph your resistances into raw power, gaining <font color="#40b606">[1] Intelligence</font> and <font color="#40b606">[3] AP Recovery</font> at the cost of <font color="#c80030">[2]% Elemental Resistance</font>.

Conjure a storm of malefic souls, causing them to rain down on 6 targets for 2 turns, each dealing [1].

The souls also apply five Agony stacks each hit, dealing [2] on-apply and each turn.

Cast a devastating spell at target area, dealing [1] and applying a stack of Agony to all enemies.

Then Purge all stacks of Agony, dealing additional piercing damage based on the number of stacks removed this way:

1 stack: [2]
2 stacks: [3]
3 stacks: [4]
4 stacks: [5]
5 stacks: [6]

If five stacks of Agony are purged from a single target, the cooldown of Inflict Agony is immediately reset.

Conjure a wicked blast, dealing [1] to enemies in target area. Applies Diseased and a stack of Agony.

A target may be afflicted with up to five stacks of Agony, each dealing piercing damage on apply and on each turn.

Deal [1] and apply a stack of Agony to the target. Then if the target has three or more stacks of Agony, they begin to Perish, causing [2] Constitution, [3] Wits, and [4]% Physical Resistance.

Perish's duration is determined by the number of Agony stacks on the target:

3 stacks: 1 turn
4 stacks: 2 turns
5 stacks: 3 turns

Apply an Ineptness Curse and a stack of Agony on the target. A character afflicted with the Ineptness Curse will spend an additional [1] AP per action.

A target may only be afflicted by one Curse at a time and its duration is determined by the number of Agony stacks on the target:

1-2 stacks: 1 turn
3-4 stacks: 2 turns
5 stacks: 3 turns

Apply a Vulnerability Curse and a stack of Agony on the target. A character afflicted with the Vulnerability Curse will have [1]% Piercing Resistance.

A target may only be afflicted by one Curse at a time and its duration is determined by the number of Agony stacks on the target:

1-2 stacks: 1 turn
3-4 stacks: 2 turns
5 stacks: 3 turns

Apply a Weakness Curse and a stack of Agony on the target. A character afflicted with the Weakness Curse will deal [1]% Damage.

A target may only be afflicted by one Curse at a time and its duration is determined by the number of Agony stacks on the target:

1-2 stacks: 1 turn
3-4 stacks: 2 turns
5 stacks: 3 turns

Blight the target, dealing [1] and applying a stack of Agony.

A target may be afflicted with up to five stacks of Agony, each dealing piercing damage on apply and on each turn:

1 stack: [2]
2 stacks: [3]
3 stacks: [4]
4 stacks: [5]
5 stacks: [6]

Enfeeble the target, causing them to Decay and Wither.

Heals cast on characters who are Decaying are instead converted into physical damage.

Characters who are Withered are afflicted with [1]% Movement Speed and [2]% Accuracy.

Applies a stack of Agony. A target may be afflicted with up to five stacks of Agony, each dealing piercing damage on apply and on each turn.

Shatter a portion of the target's soul, dealing [1].

Purges all stacks of Agony, dealing additional piercing damage based on the number of stacks removed this way:

1 stack: [2]
2 stacks: [3]
3 stacks: [4]
4 stacks: [5]
5 stacks: [6]

If five stacks of Agony are purged this way, the cooldown of Inflict Agony is immediately reset.

Manifest the soul of target corpse into a <font color="#67ffdd">Spectral Banshee</font>. The <font color="#67ffdd">Banshee</font> is a fragile caster who can increment <font color="#67ffdd">Agony</font> stacks and <font color="#ffffff">Deafen</font> foes.

Deal [1] and embed a Seed of Malice into the target for 3 turns, afflicting them with [3]% Piercing Resistance.

Upon death or after one turn, the character will explode, dealing [2] in a 5m radius, applying Agony to the target and each enemy hit in the area.

Whenever a fifth stack of Agony is applied to the character they will explode early.

Steal the soul from target corpse or an enemy with five Agony stacks and gain Ascended, reducing the cost of all Source skills by 1 for 2 turns.

May only be used once per combat.

This skill also Purges all stacks of Agony, dealing additional piercing damage based on the number of stacks removed this way:

1 stack: [2]
2 stacks: [3]
3 stacks: [4]
4 stacks: [5]
5 stacks: [6]

If five stacks of Agony are purged this way, the cooldown of Inflict Agony is immediately reset.

Target an enemy with one or more Agony. Deal [1] and apply a random Curse Aura to them lasting 3 turns, spreading the Curse to enemies within 6m.

Refresh all stacks of Agony the target has and spread them to all enemies within 6m, dealing the on-apply damage to each enemy afflicted this way:

1 stack: [2]
2 stacks: [3]
3 stacks: [4]
4 stacks: [5]
5 stacks: [6]

Blight the target, dealing [1] and applying a stack of Agony.

A target may be afflicted with up to five stacks of Agony, each dealing piercing damage on apply and on each turn:

1 stack: [2]
2 stacks: [3]
3 stacks: [4]
4 stacks: [5]
5 stacks: [6]

Deal [1] and if the target has no Physical Armour they will become Terrified, causing them to run around in fear for 1 turn.

Removes all stacks of Agony from the target. Then, the target is afflicted with a random number of Agony stacks, dealing piercing damage on apply and on each turn:

1 stack: [2]
2 stacks: [3]
3 stacks: [4]
4 stacks: [5]
5 stacks: [6]

Target an enemy with three or more Agony. Remove three Agony stacks from the target, dealing on-apply damage of the new count.

In exchange, you gain 2AP immediately and [1] Initiative for 2 turns.

Take pity on the soul of a fallen ally, Resurrecting them at 50% Vitality.

May only be used once per combat.
This scythe has been whittled from Soul Oak, imbuing it with wicked properties.
